post.description:
Creates an order of {orderType} for {secondary}:{primary} with {quantity} of {assetQuantity} at {trigger} price.

For limit and stop buy orders (orderType: LIMIT_BUY,STOP_LIMIT_BUY), price is primary per secondary. e.g. 52000 USD/BTC -> trigger: 52000.

For limit and stop sell orders (orderType: LIMIT_SELL,STOP_LIMIT_SELL), price is secondary per primary. e.g. 1 BTC / 52000 USD -> trigger: 0.0000192307.

200.description: Successful response for Place Order

put.description: Updates an existing limit or stop order's {quantity} of {assetQuantity} at {trigger} price.

200.description: Successful response for Update Order
Successful response for Dust Order

500.description: Internal server error for Dust Order

error.message: Please try again or contact support.

buyResult.message: 'Abandoned buy order due to unprocessed sell order'

sellResult.message: 'Abandoned buy order due to unprocessed sell order'

error.message: Not authorised to access this

OrderStatus.description:
1: Open (order is waiting to be executed as a trade)
2: Insufficient Balance Cancelled (order was cancelled because not enough balance)
3: Partial (order is not completed to full amount)
4: Filled (order is completed to full amount)
5: Pending (currently processing the trade)
6: User Cancelled (order was cancelled because user said so)
7: Order failed for unknown reason
8: System Cancelled (Order cancelled by Swyftx)
9: Failed due to being below the minimum trade amount
10: Refunded (Order rolled back)

OrderSource.description:
1: Quick Buy (orders placed through the quick buy feature)
2: OTC (orders placed through the OTC feature)
3: Swap (orders placed on the platform as a swap - crypto asset -> crypto asset)
4: Multi Buy (orders placed as part of a multi buy order)
5: Recurring Order (Balance) (orders placed as part of a recurring order via user balance)
6: Recurring Order (Deposit) (orders placed as part of a recurring order via deposit)
7: Parent Order (order placed as a parent order)
8: Asset Migration/Redenomination (order placed as part of an asset migration/redenomination via the asset migration script)

OrderType.description:
1: `market buy` Buys secondary asset immediately at current market rates
2: `market sell` Sells secondary asset immediately at current market rates
3: `limit buy` Buys secondary asset when price drops to trigger price
4: `limit sell` Sells secondary asset when price rises to trigger price
5: `stop limit buy` Buys secondary asset if price rises to trigger price
6: `stop limit sell` Sells secondary asset if price drops to trigger price
8: `dust sell` An order placed from dusting

OrderTypeString.description:
1: MARKET_BUY - Buys secondary asset immediately at current market rates
2: MARKET_SELL - Sells secondary asset immediately at current market rates
3: LIMIT_BUY - Buys secondary asset when price drops to trigger price
4: LIMIT_SELL - Sells secondary asset when price rises to trigger price
5: STOP_LIMIT_BUY - Buys secondary asset if price rises to trigger price
6: STOP_LIMIT_SELL - Sells secondary asset if price drops to trigger price

AssetCode.description: AUD: Asset code. See [Get Market Assets](#reference/markets/market-assets/get-market-assets) `code` for all market codes

AssetID.description: 1: Asset ID. See [Get Market Assets](#reference/markets/market-assets/get-market-assets) `id` for all market ids

FundHistoryStatusBase.description:
1: Created
2: Processed and completed
3: Rejected (network/validation/etc.)
4: Failed
5: Failed due to minimum requirements
6: Pending
7: Pending Daily Limits
8: Pending
9: Pending verification
10: Refunded
11: Pending
12: Pending
13: Cancelled
14: Unconfirmed
15: Pending verification
16: Processing
17: Pending

VerificationStatus.description:
unverified: Item is not verified
pending: Item is in the process of verification
verified: Item is verified

allOf.description: Asset code. See [Get Market Assets](#reference/markets/market-assets/get-market-assets) `code` for all market codes
Time created in milliseconds since epoch

AssetHistoryItemType.description:
DEPOSIT: deposit
WITHDRAWAL: withdrawal
BUY: buy
SELL: sell

AssetHistoryItemStatus.description:
PENDING: pending
COMPLETED: completed
FAILED: failed

AssetHistorySortKey.description:
date: date of last update to item
amount: balance denoted in specified asset
userCountryValue: value denoted in currency of user's country

SortDirection.description:
ASC: ascending order
DESC: descending order

RewardEvent.description:
DEPOSIT: Deposits into wallet
WITHDRAWAL: Withdrawals from wallet
REWARD: Rewards paid out

Scopes.description:
app.account.affiliation: Can view information about and enroll in the affiliate program
app.account.modify: Can modify account settings
app.account.tax-report: Can request a tax report
app.account.verification: Can complete email/phone/id verification processes
app.account.balance: Can get information about the balance of the account (assets, amounts, etc.)
app.account.stats: Can get statistics about the usage of the account
app.account.read: Can retrieve profile information
app.recurring-orders.read: Can read recurring order templates
app.recurring-orders.create: Can create new recurring order templates
app.recurring-orders.delete: Can delete recurring order templates
app.address.add: Can add new withdrawal/deposit addresses
app.address.remove: Can remove withdrawal/deposit addresses
app.address.check-deposit: Can initiate checking for deposits on relevant assets
app.address.read: Can view withdrawal/deposit address information
app.funds.withdraw: Can make withdrawals to registered addresses
app.funds.withdrawal-limit: Can retrieve information about current withdrawal limits and usage
app.funds.read: Can see withdrawal/deposit history
app.orders.create: Can create new buy/sell orders
app.orders.delete: Can delete existing buy/sell orders
app.orders.read: Can view existing buy/sell orders
app.orders.dust: Can dust assets
app.api.revoke: Can revoke API keys
app.api.read: Can view information about active API Keys

WithdrawalReasons.description:
1: Paying for Goods/Services
2: Paying for Ransomware
3: Transfer to Personal Wallet
4: Transfer to Custody/Interest Platform
5: Trading on another Exchange
6: Not happy with Swyftx
7: Sending to a friend
8: Transfer to my Bank Account
9: Resolving security alert
10: Instructed by a Swyftx agent
11: For my employment

WithdrawalStatus.description:
1: Pending
2: Complete
3: Failed
